availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James C. Niles (Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer. Pennsylvania native. Married to Elizabeth White Niles on August 19, 1836. Father of Wesley Niles, Mary Niles, William Niles, Bell Niles, James Niles, John Niles, and Nancy J Niles. Farmer in Campbell County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, 2nd District, p. 134B.
